name: Jungle Chill Android Cardbaord VR
description:
In this game you will stand on a platform and tap the button on your cardbaord VR unit to move and stop the platform anywhere you would like to stop and just take in the view. Its a relaxing game with some very nice visuals. It requires android 6.0 or higher with a decent spec phone.

It may or may not get updates depending on the feedback and results.
